TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void OriginalDataRestoredEventHandler(object sender, OriginalDataRestoredEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed OriginalDataRestoredEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示 事件的处理方法。

span.span: Represents a method that handles the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 每当发生该事件时，直到移除了该委托，都会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, until you remove the delegate. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建和，并将绑定到。The following code example creates a and a , and binds the to the . 然后，它创建事件处理程序。It then creates an event handler. 要测试此事件，请右键单击上方的列字母在工作表 1，然后单击**删除**的快捷菜单中。To test the event, right-click a column letter above the on sheet 1 and then click **Delete** in the shortcut menu. 事件处理程序替换列和列标题数据，并显示一条指示什么类型的数据已还原消息和，还原原始数据的原因。The event handler replaces the column and column header data and displays a message indicating what kind of data was restored and the reason that the original data was restored. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization.
